Good , I am
.timothy.schletter

I'm a designer, animator, musician and a student of the creative process.

I always seemed to be curious about how things are created. Working at the crossroads of design and front end development, I find myself rich with opportunities to explore, understand and improve the visual implementation of a digital experience.

Check out my LinkedIn to see my experience, which includes 10 years designing and building web applications for B2B, data & analytics, and digital marketing across global businesses. My experience also includes my time as a storyboard artist, contributing composer, and music supervisor on PBS's World World. Here is my resum√© for more details.
